title: Print, "Design for a Garden Parterre of Cut Grass and Colored Gravel, from "Nouveaux Livre de Parterres," in Oeuvres Du Sr. D. Marot..., The Hague:  Chez Pierre Husson, c.1702", ca. 1702
medium: Etching and black ink on cream laid paper
inscribed: Imprinted lower center:  Pieces d'Ecoup en gazon [Parterres of Cut turf and colored gravel]; lower left:  D. Marot fec:; lower right:  avec Privilegie 10
creditline: Museum purchase from General Acquisitions Endowment Fund
description: Symmetrical arrangement of parterres de broderie in desgin of fleur-de-lis and cartouches.  The spaces between filled witih colored sand or gravel.  At upper center, a reflective pool with fountain flanked by putti spewing water.  Borders of vertical grass strips flanked by potted evergreens and bands of flowers.

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, "Design for a Garden Parterre of Cut Grass and Colored Gravel, from "Nouveaux Livre de Parterres," in Oeuvres Du Sr. D. Marot..., The Hague:  Chez Pierre Husson, c.1702", ca. 1702.
ca. 1702. Etching and black ink on cream laid paper. Museum purchase from General Acquisitions Endowment Fund. 1988-4-16.
